statements: DELETE FROM visitor_access_permissions WHERE visitor_id = 1 AND permission_level = 3;
DELETE FROM visitor_access_permissions WHERE access_area = 'Restricted' AND visitor_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM visitors_access WHERE visitor_id = 101 AND access_level > 3
DELETE FROM visitors_access WHERE access_level IN (1, 2, 3) AND visitor_name LIKE 'A%'
DELETE FROM visitor_access_permissions WHERE visitor_id = 123 AND access_level > 2
DELETE FROM visitor_access WHERE visitor_id = 100 AND area_id = 200;
